title: Correction: Design of Wide-Spectrum Inhibitors Targeting Coronavirus Main Proteases
body:
In PLoS Biology, volume 3, issue 10, DOI: 10.1371/journal.pbio.0030324


There is a typesetting error remaining in equation 1, despite the Note Added in Proof indicating that the equation has been corrected. The second reaction step should not have a reverse arrow. The correct equation is as follows:
